title: Lodsworth Walks

description: Lodsworth is located between Midhurst and Petworth in West Sussex. Walkers can enjoy miles of footpaths around the local commons, woodland and countryside of the South Downs National Park. This short walk takes you along a tributary stream of the River Lod which lies just east of the village. Part of the walk runs along the Diamond Way , a long distance trail which you can use to further explore the area. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Lodsworth. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
